data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message: Exclude 'muggle' branch from Travis CI testing

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[cmd:autoprofile] Fix expected string or bytes-like object error

This error was caused when name or username fields
were set to `None`. In these cases, the regular expression
to match whether any of these values is an email address
failed. A string value is required and not a None value.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Merge branch 'fix_autoprofile_match' of 'https://github.com/sduenas/sortinghat'

Merges #171
Closes #171
Fixes #170

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message: Update version number to 0.7.3

data.Author: Aniruddha Karajgi <akarajgi0@gmail.com>
data.message: Fix a few grammatical errors in README.md (#181)

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Clean up repository before developing Sorting Hat new version

The structure of the repository and the Sorgint Hat package
will change, so it was required to have a tidy workspace to
avoid future problems.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Exclude 'master' branch from Travis CI testing

With this change Travis is not going to run any testing which
involves 'master' and 'muggle' branch. This will be restored
once the tests of 'muggle' branch are ready.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Set basic Django structure

This commit adds the basic structure of the project to work with
Django framework.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Add flake8 configuration

This configuration sets the maximum line length to 130
characters because some unit tests can have long lines;
excludes some directories from the analysis, such as docs,
build, docker, etc; and ignores the next errors:

  * E129 visually indented line with same indent as next logical line
  * E402 module level import not at top of file
  * F841 local variable '_' is assigned to but never used

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[model] Migrate model to Django ORM

The previous Sorting Hat model was based on SQLAlchemy ORM.
This one preserves the same structure but adds two new fields
to each object. These two new fields are 'created_at' and
'last_modified'.

The first field will be set only to the date when an object
is created. The second one will be set automatically when an
object is modified.

Along with this commit, it's been included the migrations file
used by Django to setup the database; the requirements file
with the Python packages needed to run this software and
a directory with unit tests.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[graphql] Define basic GraphQL query to fetch organizations

This commit defines a basic schema and a query to retrieve
the information stored by an organization. To ask for the
list of organizations and their domains stored by SortingHat,
a GraphQL query would be like this:

```
{
  organizations {
    name
    domains {
      domain
      isTopDomain
    }
  }
}
```

GraphQL support is provided by `graphene` and `graphene_django`
libraries. The project configuration has been modified to
set the GraphQL web client for testing purposes. This client
is accessible through '/graphql' URL. In a future, it will be
removed from the standard configuration.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[admin] Add SortingHat core model to the admin interface

SortingHat model core objects have been add to the admin
interface to speed up testing tasks. Through this interface,
objects can be added/edited/removed easy.

The model was also updated to include `__str__` methods to
display objects identifier in the admin interface.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
Merge branch 'muggle-basic-graphql' of 'https://github.com/sduenas/sortinghat'

Merges #172
Closes #172
Fixes #167

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[errors] Add base core exceptions

This patch adds the base core exception from all defined
exceptions will inherit. It also adds 'AlreadyExistsError'
class to handle errors when inserting instances that
exists in the database.

These exceptions will be managed and handled internally by
the SortingHat service.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[db] Add function to add organizations

The function add_organization() allows to create and add
a new Organization object to the database.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[db] Add function to remove organizations

The function delete_organization() removes an Organization
and its related objects (i.e Domains or Enrollments)
from the  database.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[db] Add function to add domains

The function add_domain() allows to create and to add
a new Domain object in the database and link it
to an Organization object.

data.Author: Santiago Dueñas <sduenas@bitergia.com>
data.message:
[db] Add function to remove domains

The function delete_domain() removes a Domain
from the database.
